ISSUE.TITLE: Localize grids
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ![browseractions](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5019111/17994443/75b6a970-6b61-11e6-8638-48147445e074.PNG) ![browserstatus](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5019111/17994446/78a96262-6b61-11e6-855e-d39d08b02ea4.PNG) ![browsertotals](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5019111/17994447/7a812da4-6b61-11e6-87bd-6587252661ed.PNG) but we also have a task to replace the grid. let's do it first

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #2841 Fixed the date problem on the customer reviews page

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1787 Added some localized resource for grids

Upgrate from original repo (#1) * #2697 Localizae value of "Is system role" property on the customer details page * Move PluginManager constants to properties * Move PluginManager GetPluginDescriptor methods from utilities to methods * Move plugins uploading methods to UploadManager * Rename ThemeConfiguration to ThemeDescriptor * Rename some ThemeProvider methods * Move some of theme files in Nop.Core project * Rename theme Title to FriendlyName * Move ThemeProvider constants to properties * Move ThemeProvider GetThemeDescriptor method from utilities to methods * Add IDescriptor interface * #353 Add support for uploading themes in the same way as plugins * #353 Move UploadManager and ThemeProvider to Nop.Services project * #353 Move static UploadManager to injectable UploadService * #353 Rename locales, change uploaded sample file * Minor fix. Added forgotten using * Update Square.Connect library to the latest version * #2250 Fixed "rounding with 0.05 interval" error * Square payment plugin. Remove option to use personal access tokens. * Square payment plugin. Send a payment note with each transaction * Square payment plugin. Make token renewal period 14 days by default and remove ability to change it from the plugin configuration page * Square payment plugin. Update error handling * Square payment plugin. Add Integration ID parameter to charge requests * Square payment plugin. Pull additional locations info * Square payment plugin. Change message on pending refund * Square payment plugin. Leave the access token editable * Remove warnings about shipping plugins. They are not required * Wrong URL warning should be error (not just a warning) * #2715 Display warnings on admin area home page if a store has some errors * Squre integration ID is now hard-coded * Added logos to the WorldPay plugin * Updated WorldPay instructions * Updated WorldPay developer ID * Updated Worldpay instructions * Simplified a way to init schedule tasks from plugins. There's no need to specify the fully qualified assembly name now * Removed extra spae from Worldpay plugin * Updated a schedule task type in the Square plugin * Square payment plugin. Add UseSandbox setting * Square plugin. Added validation for sandbox account * Square payment plugin. Further changes to validation for sandbox credentials * Updated "ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs" third-party library to the latest version * Worldpay payment plugin. Use certified developer credentials * #2250 Rewrote "rounding with 0.05 interval" * Updated fast installation SQL scripts * Added upgrade scripts for the next version * Fixed the issue with "Notify me" button for back in stock subscriptions * #2745 Added missing "partial" keyword * Fixed an issue in the previous commit * Updated nopCommerce version to 4.10 * #2762 Forum pager (small) didn't work * Source code refactoring. Remove redundant chars * #2752 Meta keywords didn't work for grouped products * #2774 Fix bug with overridden rates for international shipping in the UPS plugin * #2774 Remove testing data from previous commit * #2738 Exclude from bundle scripts in Worldpay and Square payment plugins * #2738 Remove try-catch block * #196 Updated third-party packages * #2749 Ensure that display order of shipping methods is distinct * #2702 Removed "ParseTaxRates" from "Order" entity * #2724 Currency details page. Wrong URL was used in a hint * #2768 Support multiple topics (the same system name) with ACL * #2780 Fixed problem with not create browscap.crawlersonly.xml file * Added index into database for speedup executing GetLowStockProducts method from ProductService * #2733 Rename GetPublicViewComponent method of IWidgetPlugin * #2730 Add OrderVoided event * #2631 Rename all event types at the same way for the consistency * #2385 Added displaying the customer avatar (if enabled) in the customer list page * #2282 Added support import picture of product by URL * Return view component name as output instead of out parameter * Minor addition to the previous commit * #2788 Square payment plugin. Identify a route by name instead of route values * #2788 Worldpay plugin. Identify a route by name instead of route values * #33 Further changes to properly format dates in Kendo grids * #2777 Ignore reviews of deleted products * #2769 Support order tokens in "return request" message templates * #2717 Create a new language. Pre-set "Display order" * Fixed problems in tests * #484 Pass entire model to widgets * Refactoring. The code of the PrepareRenderWidgetModel method is simplified * #2744 Performance optimization.Implemented loading only total count for PagedList instance creating by IQueryable<T> * #793 Allowed a store owner to search topics by keywords * #2776 Ignore reviews of limited to stores products and filter reviews on enabled ShowProductReviewsPerStore setting on the account page * #2341 Add entity reference to activity log * Implemented display primary currency code on Value of 'X' (free shipping) * #2721 Fixed problem with IPv6 in GetCurrentIPAddress method * #1500 Moved default view (grid/view) setting to UI * Renamed a locale * Move PluginFinder to Nop.Services project * Add PluginUpdatedEvent * #783 Clear cached widgets on updating a widget plugin descriptor * #1918 Add filters by dates on the discount list page * #2751 Ensure that built-in "crawler" (search engine) customer account cannot be affiliated * #2679 "Registration method" setting (values) wasn't localizable * #2740 CommonSettings were reset (cleared) when updating settings for an individual store * Updated third-party libraries to the latest version * #2722 There's no need to explicitly validate child properties anymore. FluentValidation library again supports automatic (implicit) validation of child properties * #2783 Prevent adding the same picture to the product * #2721 Further changes. Added a code comment * #558 Warning admin that the entered SKU already exists * #2807 Add Form property to BaseNopModel * #2502 Add filter by unpublished products on low stock report page * #2707 Add pagination support on "AppliedTo" discount pages * Fix bug with ignoring the selected services on saturday delivery in UPS shipping plugin * #1991 Do not display product availability until all required product attributes are selected * #2819 Fix bug with empty tokens in test message templates * #2115 Implemented showing vendor name on the shopping cart and order details page * #2249 #2775 Send all active message templates with the same name * #73 Add settings to include customer identifier to the Google Analytics script * #1004 Added possibility to preselect a country if there's only one country available (public store) * #2729 Fixed address restriction and "Shipping to the same address" issue * Added ignore rules into AutoMapper configuration * #2820 Use analytics.js as predefined script on installation GoogleAnalytics plugin * #2823 Add inline scripts in the correct order * #290 Add PictureId to product attribute combination * #1374 Allow admin to provide external links to his store which include a discount coupon code * #1981 Notify customers when a store owner (or vendor) replies to their product reviews * #2800 Added ignoring of products with the unchecked "Visible individually" property on cross-sell products list and related products list * #1973 Added possibility a store owner to delete shopping carts and wishlists on the admin area. * #2728 Fixed dotnet build problem * update Register view - add localize labels for birth day For languages other than English, localized. * #1503 Use product URL instead just a name in "Require other products added to the cart" warning * #2821 Fixed rounding bug * Create CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md * Create CONTRIBUTING.md * Create ISSUE_TEMPLATE.md * #662 Added order notification to affiliate * #2731 Add URL encoding on RoxyFilemanController to allow downloading files with non-ASCII chars in names * #2731 Add URL encoding on redirection to URL with non-ASCII chars * #2841 Fixed the date problem on the customer reviews page * #1787 Added some localized resource for grids * #1359 Added possibility a store owner to view all mapped products on a specification details page * Remove SecureUrl property from the Store entity * Proper determination of the store location in WebHelper * Replace some of direct using Store.Url to using IWebHelper.GetStoreLocation method * #2833 Add method to properly generating URLs in MessageTokenProvider * Updated FluentValidation library to the latest version * Updated MaxMind.GeoIP2 library to the latest version * Updated GeoLite2-Country.mmdb database * Updated Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc and ServiceModel libraries to the latest version * #2824 More accurate start time of schedule tasks (after application restart) * #2833 Properly encoding URL * #1524 Added setting to sort Reviews by Date Created Desc OR Asc * #2782 Support filtering by product in summary reports on the order list page (admin area) * Simplfied generated SQL command on the order list page (admin area) * #2840 Added "Host" directive to robots.txt * #2320 Implemented splitting "big import file" * #2795 Fixed problem with assembly blocking on application startup * #2848 Added PublicAntiForgery to the Login method * #2779 Do not duplicate plugin version and description in csproj files * Performance optimization of sitemap.xml generation (load all categories at once) * Removed obsolete source code comment * #2757 Prent throwing of InvalidCastException in admin area (notifications) * #1974 Combined shopping and wishlist pages on admin area * #1974 Further changes. Selecting the menu item * #1974 Further changes. Added page title * #2791 Moved widget zones to separate classes * update Info view - add localize for birth day For languages other than English, the date of birth will be displayed in the local info customer form. * Wrong event was invoked in "RegisterCustomer" method * Updated "FluentValidation.AspNetCore" library to the latest version * Refactoring. Removed extra comma * Source code refactoring * #2791 Renamed some widget zone names (variable names) * #2737 Performance optimization when we have a lot of categories. * #2737 Performance optimization when we have a lot of categories. Discounts applied to categories * #26 Added possibility to set product attribute price adjustments as percentages * Removed unused parameter. Anyway the implementation was too slow * Refactoring. Removed redundant code * Refactoring. There's no need to reset cache in CategoryService in some cases * #2737 Performance optimization when we have a lot of categories. Load all categories only once and cache them * #2737 Performance optimization when we have a lot of categories. Load all categories only once and cache them. Further changes (ACL) * #2737 Performance optimization when we have a lot of categories. Refactoring of "GetChildCategoryIds" method. Now it doesn't make multiple SQL requests * Update SitemapGenerator.cs to use gregorian date in sitemaps Currently sitemap uses culture specific dates for generating modification dates of products, which leads to dates like "2561-01-29" for cultures which their default calendar is something other than gregorian calendar. This update fixes this issue in sitemaps' <lastmod> fields. * Further changes on the previous commit * Performance optimization. Enabled a stored procedure to load categories (database paging) * #2856 Remove WebDAV module so that we can make DELETE requests (for WebAPI plugins) * #2852 Add var initialization * #196 Updated iTextSharp to the latest version * #2791 Further changes on "Moved widget zones to separate classes" * #2723 Add missed TaxRate to recurring orders * Issue 417 Allow a store owner to create vendor attributes * #2540 Add county to address * #2286 Add setting to ship product separately one item each * #2860 Added showing error message when two or more categories have the same name * #2771 Added settings for hide/show footer items * #2755 More accurate rounding in PayPal Direct plugin * #1418 Admin area. Simplified javascript code for grid checkboxes * #2781 Deleted unnecessary code * #2351 Properly displaying reports for dates with daylight saving time * #739 Added possibility to find orders by phone number * #2215 Add sitemap pagination * #2215 Further changes on the sitemap page * #2403 Some further changes * #2243 Added possibility to create several product attribute combinations * #2726 Fixed datepicker wrapper bug * #2726 Fixed styles for datepicker * #2873 Use dependency injection to get JSON serializer settings in BaseAdminController * #33 Rename UseIsoDateTimeConverterInJson settings * #2641 Use proper protocol to generate canonical URLs * #2753 Use proper protocol to generate Twitter and Open Graph URLs * #2874 To lowercase canonical URLs * Fixed errors on tests * #2183 Add delay usage of reward points when adding them manually in admin area * #2834 Allow the use of cookies from SSL protected page on the other store pages which are not * #2893 Require write permission for \logs directory * #196 Updated some third-party libraries to the latest version * #1912 Allow to set number of days when reward points are valid * #1912 Add settings to configure registration points validity * #1912 Add settings to configure purchases points validity * #1912 Add validity of reward points when adding them manually in admin area * #1910 Add settings to configure minimum order total when points are granted * #2834 Fixed exception on installation page * #196 Update RedLock library to the latest version * #717 Added ability to allow a store owner to disable checkout process * Fixed problem with a space in path on ClearPluginAssemblies.proj file * Fixed error in unit tests after 38b7f505d018540cc8017844d479c9ca2a0a7fe9 commit * #2899 Fixed bug on search by store id on "Topics (pages)" page
